text: Els Pelgrom (born 2 April 1934), pseudonym of Else Koch, is a Dutch children's writer. Pelgrom is the first author to have received the Gouden Griffel award three times. She was born in Arnhem, Netherlands. Her best known books are De kinderen van het achtste woud, Kleine Sofie en Lange Wapper and De eikelvreters. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch children's writers Category:People from Arnhem Category:Writers from Gelderland
title: Els Pelgrom
